DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the project is to improve the overall treatment and outcome of renal, pancreas or liver transplanted patients who have encountered a malignancy by a structured treatment program for diagnosis and treatment of the malignancy, optimization of the immunosuppressive treatment, follow-up and evaluation of the program.
DOC.criteria: Patients willing and capable of giving written informed consent of participation in the project Patients with a previous diagnosed or presently diagnosed or reoccurrence of a malignancy (other then basal cell carcinoma) Patients with a primary liver cancer as cause of the transplantation
